Message:
I’ve been a witch
from the day I was born.

Raised in a village made up
of witches and their families,

I grew up thinking that being
a witch was normal.

I mean my mom’s a witch,
and all my neighbors were
witches...

As per village law,
I tried not to involve myself
with “normal” people...

But I was always so
jealous of the people
in the books I read—

free to live their lives
however they want
in the outside world.
